keyword: how many calories are in popeyes biscuits
title: How Many Calories in Popeyes Biscuits?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in Popeyes biscuits, including full nutrition breakdown per biscuit, macros, and serving tips for fast food tracking.
h1: How Many Calories in Popeyes Biscuits?
assumptions: Standard Popeyes buttermilk biscuit (about 57 g), freshly baked as served in restaurants, no added toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, batch, and preparation; fast food values are approximate. Check Popeyes app or packaging for latest info.

quick_answer.text: One Popeyes biscuit contains about 230 calories, with 27 g carbs and 4 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror standard Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with restaurant disclosures.

tweaks.label: Split and share one biscuit (half serving)

faqs.q: How many calories are in one Popeyes biscuit?
What are the carbs in Popeyes biscuits?
faqs.a: About 27 g total carbs, including 1 g fiber and 3 g sugars per biscuit.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a Popeyes biscuit?
faqs.a: Around 640 mg of sodium per biscuit, so watch intake if limiting salt.

faqs.q: Are Popeyes biscuits high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, 12 g total fat (6 g saturated) per biscuit from buttery preparation.

faqs.q: How does Popeyes biscuit nutrition compare to homemade?
faqs.a: Restaurant versions are often higher in calories and sodium due to commercial baking; homemade can be lighter with substitutions.
